name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Norberto Roberto MARTINEZ, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Norberto Roberto MARTINEZ, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of July, 2007, Andrea Mertz, Esquire is directed to comply with Pa.R.Crim.P. 122(B)(2). The petition for allowance of appeal nunc pro tunc is to be filed within forty-five (45) days of the date of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Norberto Roberto MARTINEZ, Petitioner.
No. 82 MM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 25, 2007.
